short.ar: انقر مرة واحدة لاستخراج بيانات الأعمال المحلية من Google My Business وتصدير العملاء المحتملين إلى ملفات CSV.
short.am,bg,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,e: One click to extract Local Business Data from Google My Business and export leads to CSV files.
short.bn: গুগল মাই বিজনেস থেকে স্থানীয় ব্যবসায়ের ডেটা উত্তোলন এবং লিড গুলি CSV ফাইলে রপ্তানির জন্য এক ক্লিক।
short.de: Mit einem Klick lokale Unternehmensdaten von Google My Business extrahieren und Leads in CSV-Dateien exportieren.
short.es: Un clic para extraer datos de negocios locales de Google My Business y exportar clientes potenciales a archivos CSV.
short.fr: Un clic pour extraire les données des entreprises locales de Google My Business et exporter les prospects vers des fichiers CSV.
short.hi: एक क्लिक में Google My Business से स्थानीय व्यापार डेटा निकालें और लीड्स को सीएसवी फ़ाइल में निर्यात करें।
short.id: Satu klik untuk mengekstrak Data Bisnis Lokal dari Google My Business dan mengekspor prospek ke file CSV.
short.it: Un clic per estrarre i dati delle attività locali da Google My Business e esportare i contatti in file CSV.
short.ja: Google マイ ビジネスからローカルビジネスデータを抽出し、リードを CSV ファイルにエクスポートするためのワンクリック。
short.ko: Google My Business에서 지역 비즈니스 데이터를 한 번의 클릭으로 추출하고 리드를 CSV 파일로 내보냅니다.
short.mr: गूगल माय बिझनेसमधून स्थानिक व्यवसाय डेटा एक्सट्रॅक्ट करण्यासाठी एक क्लिक आणि लीड्स CSV फाइलमध्ये निर्यात करणे.
short.nl: Met één klik lokale bedrijfsgegevens extraheren uit Google My Business en leads exporteren naar CSV-bestanden.
short.ru: Одним кликом извлекайте данные о местных предприятиях из Google My Business и экспортируйте лиды в файлы CSV.
short.sv: Ett klick för att extrahera lokala företagsdata från Google My Business och exportera leads till CSV-filer.
short.sw: Bonyeza moja kuchimbua Data ya Biashara za Mitaa kutoka Google My Business na kuuza miongozo kwa faili za CSV.
short.ta: ஒரு கிளிக் மூலம் கூகுள் என் பிரின்ஸஸிலிருந்து உள்ள உயர்நிலை வணிக தரவுகளை ஏற்று CSV கோப்புகளுக்கு ஏற்றுமதி செய்யும்.
short.te: గూగుల్ నా వ్యాపారం నుండి స్థానిక వ్యాపార డేటాను ఎక్స్ట్రాక్ట్ చేయడానికి ఒక క్లిక్ మరియు లీడ్స్ను CSV ఫైళ్ళకు ఎగుమతి చేయడం.
short.tr: Google My Business'dan Yerel İşletme Verilerini çıkarmak ve potansiyel müşterileri CSV dosyalarına aktarmak için bir tıklama.
short.vi: Một cú nhấp chuột để trích xuất Dữ liệu Doanh nghiệp Địa phương từ Google My Business và xuất khách hàng tiềm năng ra tệp CSV.
short.zh_CN: 一键从Google My Business提取本地企业数据并将潜在客户导出为CSV文件。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overview:
This tool enables you to extract local business leads from G my business with ease, including phone numbers, websites, email addresses, social media links, and physical addresses. This scraper automatically extracts the business data you need. You can even export the results to a CSV or Excel file with a single click.

Features:
✅   Extracts business name, phone numbers, website URLs, email addresses, social media links, physical addresses, from search results pages.
✅   Automatically paginates to retrieve all search results.
✅   Collects local leads when you search or move in the maps.
✅   Export results to CSV/XLSX.


Is it Free?
Yes, it's completely free! You can access basic functionalities or upgrade for more features.

Feedback and Support:
If you have any questions or need support, please contact us here: https://forms.gle/ryakermMciHccHHW6

Privacy and Security:
We take your privacy seriously. All data scraped are processed locally and will never be transmitted to our servers. We do not keep your data.
